rules.rule 1: Always carry a fitted face mask with you and wear indoors unless you have a lawful reason not to. Everyone in Victoria aged 12 years and older needs to carry a fitted face mask outside of their home.

rules.rule 2: Maintain physical distancing – stay at least 1.5 metres from others (except for those from the same household). If you cannot keep 1.5 metres away from people you don’t live with, wear a fitted mask.

rules.rule 3: Practise good hand hygiene and regularly and thoroughly wash your hands.

rules.rule 4: If you feel unwell, get tested as soon as you can and isolatefrom others until you get your results. Do not travel if you are unwell.

rules.rule 5: Cough and sneeze into a tissue or your elbow.
